firstNightReminder: Ask if the Distiller wants to use their ability. If they do ask them to choose a type of Potion. Point to every player holding that Type of Potion and put down the Reminder 'Used' on them.
otherNightReminder: If the Distiller does not have the 'Used' Reminder token on them. Ask if the Distiller wants to use their ability. If they do ask them to choose a type of Potion. Point to every player holding that Type of Potion and put down the Reminder 'Used' on them.
name: Distiller
ability: Once per game at night, you may name a type of Potion; you learn each player that holds that type of potion.
flavor: Ein Glas ist fabelhaft, zwei sind zu viel, und drei zu wenig.
